p: The yield of essential oil extracted from lemon verbena with hydrodistillation method is 20.14 ± 0.27% (v/w). The percentage of 15 compounds in lemon verbena essential oil was determined using GC‐MS which was reported in Table 1. Limonene (18.41%), nerol (16.1%), geranial (13.02%), β‐cital (6.94%), and β‐caryophyllene (4.78%) were the most abundant compounds of lemon verbena essential oil.
